body:
This proposal appears to have two üëç s and no pushback (at this time), so I suppose I'll go ahead and create a CL, which can be reviewed and considered for merging.

FWIW, I've also run a lightweight informal twitter poll, and [it suggested](https://twitter.com/shurcooL/status/744303350875725824) that the majority of people currently mis-interpret the functionality of `Clean` regarding slash (`/`) character replacement. 29% of people got it right, and 43% incorrectly thought that `Clean` does not replace slash characters. The rest didn't know/didn't vote.

Created CL https://golang.org/cl/24467.
